summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 23.44.022, 23.45.006, 23.45.009, 23.45.014, 23.45.016, 23.45.048, 23.45.090, 23.45.146, 23.47.004, 23.50.012, 23.54.015, 23.55.026, 23.69.012, 23.69.022, and 23.84.018 of the Seattle Municipal Code; repealing Section 23.16.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and adding a new Section 23.45.017 to the Seattle Municipal Code; to correct errors and add back language inadvertently omitted in the adoption of recent land use legislation; and declaring an emergency.
